49871.summary: Some customers in the Griesbach area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49871.title: May 25 - Edmonton (Griesbach) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
